mapper.select: SELECT date_format(t.cdate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM partner t WHERE t.cdate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT concat(DATE_FORMAT(t.cdate,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.cdate),2,0),'周') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM partner t WHERE t.cdate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.cdate,'%Y-%m') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM partner t WHERE t.cdate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT CONCAT(n.date_str,' ',n.client_id) date_str,num FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.create_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str, t.client_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM customer t WHERE t.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.client_id ORDER BY date_str )n

SELECT CONCAT(n.date_str,' ',n.client_id) date_str,num FROM( SELECT concat(DATE_FORMAT(t.create_datetime,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.create_datetime),2,0),'周') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num, t.client_id FROM customer t WHERE t.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.client_id ORDER BY date_str )n

SELECT CONCAT(n.date_str,' ',n.client_id) date_str,num FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.create_datetime,'%Y-%m') AS date_str, t.client_id, COUNT(*) AS num FROM customer t WHERE t.create_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.client_id ORDER BY date_str )n
SELECT t.client_id as date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM customer t WHERE t.create_datetime < #{endDate} GROUP BY t.client_id

SELECT n.date_str, COUNT(*) as num FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str, t.uid, COUNT(t.uid) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE t.status_active = 5 AND t.pay_datetime IS NOT NULL AND t.pay_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.uid ORDER BY date_str) n GROUP BY n.date_str

SELECT n.date_str, COUNT(*) as num FROM( SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(t.create_datetime,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.create_datetime),2,0),'周') AS date_str, t.uid, COUNT(t.uid) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE t.status_active = 5 AND t.pay_datetime IS NOT NULL AND t.pay_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.uid ORDER BY date_str) n GROUP BY n.date_str

SELECT n.date_str, COUNT(*) as num FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_datetime,'%Y-%m') AS date_str, t.uid, COUNT(t.uid) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE t.status_active = 5 AND t.pay_datetime IS NOT NULL AND t.pay_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.uid ORDER BY date_str) n GROUP BY n.date_str

SELECT n.date_str, COUNT(*) as num FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str, t.uid, COUNT(t.uid) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE t.status_active = 5 AND t.pay_datetime IS NOT NULL AND t.pay_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.uid ORDER BY date_str) n WHERE n.num > 1 GROUP BY n.date_str

SELECT n.date_str, COUNT(*) as num FROM( SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(t.create_datetime,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.create_datetime),2,0),'周') AS date_str, t.uid, COUNT(t.uid) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE t.status_active = 5 AND t.pay_datetime IS NOT NULL AND t.pay_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.uid ORDER BY date_str) n WHERE n.num > 1 GROUP BY n.date_str

SELECT n.date_str, COUNT(*) as num FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_datetime,'%Y-%m') AS date_str, t.uid, COUNT(t.uid) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE t.status_active = 5 AND t.pay_datetime IS NOT NULL AND t.pay_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.uid ORDER BY date_str) n WHERE n.num > 1 GROUP BY n.date_str
SELECT COUNT(*) as num FROM( SELECT t.uid, COUNT(t.uid) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE t.status_active = 5 AND t.pay_datetime IS NOT NULL AND t.pay_datetime < #{endDate} GROUP BY t.uid ) n

SELECT COUNT(*) as num FROM( SELECT t.uid, COUNT(t.uid) AS num FROM pay_order t WHERE t.status_active = 5 AND t.pay_datetime IS NOT NULL AND t.pay_datetime < #{endDate} GROUP BY t.uid ) n WHERE n.num > 1

SELECT date_format(t.p2s_assign_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM serviceunit t WHERE t.pid=0 AND t.p2s_assign_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT date_format(t.p_reject_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM serviceunit t WHERE t.pid=0 AND t.p_reject_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT concat(DATE_FORMAT(t.p2s_assign_datetime,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.p2s_assign_datetime),2,0),'周') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM serviceunit t WHERE t.pid=0 AND t.p2s_assign_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT concat(DATE_FORMAT(t.p_reject_datetime,'%Y'),'/', LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(t.p_reject_datetime),2,0),'周') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM serviceunit t WHERE t.pid=0 AND t.p_reject_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.p2s_assign_datetime,'%Y-%m') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM serviceunit t WHERE t.pid=0 AND t.p2s_assign_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.p_reject_datetime,'%Y-%m') AS date_str, COUNT(*) AS num FROM serviceunit t WHERE t.p_reject_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str ORDER BY date_str

select a.date_str,a.num AS sendNum,p.partner_id AS id,p.name from (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.p2s_assign_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str,t.partner_id,COUNT(*) AS num FROM serviceunit t where t.pid=0 and t.p2s_assign_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.partner_id ORDER BY date_str) a,partner p where a.partner_id=p.partner_id

select a.date_str,a.num AS singleNum,p.partner_id AS id,p.name from (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.p_reject_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date_str,t.partner_id,COUNT(*) AS num FROM serviceunit t where t.pid=0 and t.p_reject_datetime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY date_str,t.partner_id ORDER BY date_str) a,partner p where a.partner_id=p.partner_id
